original_title: Strangers in the Night: The Bert Kaempfert Story
overview: This documentary from the golden 1920s to the disco era lets relatives, colleagues and friends of Bert Kaempfert like Freddy Quinn, James Last and Brenda Lee have their say and invites you to meet again with Nat "King" Cole, Caterina Valente and many more.
title: Strangers in the Night: The Bert Kaempfert Story
